definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: Do you along with take your father's photograph?
sentences.chinese: 你随身带着令尊的照片啊？

sentences.english: We must ask help from your father.
You will understand perfectly that I cannot at present correspond with your father.
sentences.chinese: 你一定完全了解，我目前不能写信给令尊。

sentences.english: Tom Hagen: Sonny, your father would hate it. This is business, not personal!
sentences.chinese: 山尼，令尊不会喜欢的，这是生意，不能感情用事。

sentences.english: And what does your father do?
Please remember me to your father.
I've a very kind letter here from your father, sir, and beg my respectful compliments to him.
sentences.chinese: 承令尊的情，写给我一封信，请你回去多多致意。

sentences.english: I'm sorry to hear that your father passed away last night.
sentences.chinese: 听到令尊昨晚去世的消息很难受。

sentences.english: Your august father is my friend.
I don't know as how your father will like that.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道令尊是否喜欢那样。

definition: uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
